function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of close proximity between workers leading to increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 among workers, impacting health and productivity","Mitigation":"Enforce strict physical distancing measures and rotate work schedules to reduce the number of workers on-site","Technologies":"Use technology-infused equipment to alert employees when they are within close proximity to each other","People":"On-site workers","Owner":"Construction site managers and supervisors"},{"Description":"Risk of prolonged project timelines due to safety overhauls and social distancing rules","Impact":"Stress and anxiety among workers, delayed project completion, and increased costs","Mitigation":"Increase project timelines to allow for proper safety measures and sanitation, and provide support for employee well-being","Technologies":"Remote technology for inspections and virtual engagement tools for customer interactions","People":"Construction project managers and workers","Owner":"Construction project managers and stakeholders"},{"Description":"Risk of increased stress and anxiety among workers due to longer project timelines and changes in work processes","Impact":"Reduced productivity, workplace dissatisfaction, and potential impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Provide support for employee well-being, encourage flexible work arrangements, and promote a healthy work environment","Technologies":"Remote technology tools for virtual engagement and remote work arrangements","People":"Office workers and construction project managers","Owner":"Company leadership and HR departments"}]}
